content: - 5 -   Finally, I expect that U.S. policy normalization will be gradual under likely   scenarios for the evolution of output and inflation.  A gradual and ongoing removal of   accommodation seems likely both to maximize the prospects of a continued expansion in   the U.S. economy and to mitigate the risk of undesirable spillovers abroad.
